channel.title: When you were a beginner
channel.description:
How did you learn to start Java? And why did you? Why was it so interesting?
My answer:
I learned Java by basically reading my server codes.. It took about a year to get the hang of it, but I am still learning. I wanted to learn Java, because I knew that was the language RSPS's came in.
/discuss + answer

item.title: When you were a beginner
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

ytuio9:

Don’t learn Java from rsps, you get bad habits that stick with you for a loong time.

Assuming you’re incapable of learning. Oh wai-

item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

I use to get Czar server when they were first released and screw around with them change text. Then moved on to delta and improved a little more. Quit RSPS then moved to RSBot (Powerbot) scripting then back to Project Insanity.

And…
…
…
…
…
…

I’m still bad with JAVA.

item.title: When you were a beginner
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:38, topic:403441”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=500502.msg3665854#msg3665854 date=1310611758]
No, I was saying that since I know you (I’ve talked to you some on IRC iirc), it doesn’t bother me as much, I was just curious as to why you didn’t like it.
[/quote]

Oh alright. No i just hate programming in general (mainly bc i blow chode at every language) but I haven’t really found a language that i really… prefer. I’ve tried java, c#, c++, perl, and pascal but i don’t really like any of them.

@yt i don’t think c# is better than java, i don’t really prefer either of them. oh and yes i would enjoy death

n10si t evidently knows nothing

you’re quick[/quote]
I was referring to him because he was all "LOL C# IS BAD JUST BECAUSE ALSO THIS MAKES ME INTERNET COOLNESS++ JUST SAYIN`|

Read full topic

item.title: When you were a beginner
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“dain bramage, post:31, topic:403441”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=500502.msg3665922#msg3665922 date=1310614407]

I never bashed anything. I was just stating that C# is basically, and again, literally, Microsoft’s attempt at a Java-like language. It was simply a response to your “Java is a terrible language”, since C# operates in the same manner.

They’re both, in my eyes, functionally equivalent.
[/quote]C# has more features than Java, and I gave one of my reasons as to why java is a terrible language.

What IDE do you use for C#?
I know a bit of the language from when I was on windows with microsofts visual studio. Would be nice to take another look.[/quote]When I’m on windows, I use Microsoft Visual C#, on linux MonoDevelop.

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:40, topic:403441”]C# im pretty sure is quicker thats why people like it better, also runs smoother as Evil demonstrated that there is less line of code.[/quote]Depends on what you’re doing, honestly the only thing that I’d use Java for instead of C# is stuff to do with hacking java games, because it would be easier than creating glue for JNI.

Also, another good thing about C#, you can load methods from a DLL, but said DLL doesn’t have to be formatted any certain way as it does with Java, which means you can literally take a DLL and just create a C# wrapper for it. In java, you’d have to create a wrapper for that DLL with your own DLL, with methods that conform to “Java_BLeh_Meh_Method(…)” then create the wrapper in java for that.

Read full topic

u prolly think ruby is better

You will never find an answer because people have different needs, they judge with different criteria.[/quote]

item.title: When you were a beginner
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:22, topic:403441”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=500502.msg3665460#msg3665460 date=1310591315]

[quote author=anthonyduka link=topic=500502.msg3664084#msg3664084 date=1310511877]

I actually started with private servers in 2006, I rarely ever use java anymore though it’s such a shit language

u prolly think ruby is better
[/quote]He likes C#

oh he’s even more queer than i thought

[/quote]Mind explaining the problem with C#?

Same question to you, n10si t, but I know you so it doesn’t rage me as much as a faggot fanboy trying to act cool

your grammar is fine but i still don’t understand what you said. did you call me a faggot fanboy trying to act cool or are you referring to one? oh and the problem with c#:

[quote author=T4_ link=topic=500502.msg3665499#msg3665499 date=1310593281]
C# is the about the same as Java.
[/quote][/quote]No, I was saying that since I know you (I’ve talked to you some on IRC iirc), it doesn’t bother me as much, I was just curious as to why you didn’t like it.

I was calling anthonyduka a fanboy faggot

[quote=“dain bramage, post:27, topic:403441”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=500502.msg3665805#msg3665805 date=1310609489]

I actually started with private servers in 2006, I rarely ever use java anymore though it’s such a shit language
[/quote]C# is Microsoft’s Java. Literally.

I thought Microsoft started developing a language almost the same as Java at one time. J# or something. Also, Java has strings in switch statements. I think it was implemented in SE7.[/quote]

Pretty much, they had J# then Sun complained so they just made their own language.

But honestly, “It’s Microsoft’s Java” is a REALLY fucking bad reason to “hate” a language, especially if you are on windows.

and if you want to throw up the “C# doesn’t work on linux” argument, I’m on linux and I use C# all the time, hell one of the more well-known music players on linux, Banshee, is written in C#

Read full topic
